name: The Lighthouse (itch) (Narom42)
description:
In the Lighthouse, you play as the new guardian of light.

After your father passed aways, you must carry on your family's legacy. 

While there was no guardian, shadows have gained power and it is almost but not too late. You have to train quickly, master your power and prevent the world from falling into the hands of shadows.

Join our Mailing List !

You can also find me on twitter : Narom42
